Workshop on AI for Computational Social Systems

9th FEBRUARY 2020, IIIT Delhi

The Workshop on AI for Computational Social Systems is a one-day gathering of some of the most influential people in the field of Computational Social Systems, which covers areas like Data Mining, Complex Networks, Social Computing, Natural Language Processing and Data-driven Cybersecurity.

It is being organized by the Laboratory for Computational Social Systems (LCS2) at IIIT Delhi.

A007, R&D Block, IIIT Delhi
Okhla Industrial Estate, Phase III
Near Govind Puri Metro Station
New Delhi, Delhi 110020
